metadata.title: CVE-2022-0918 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A vulnerability was discovered in the 389 Directory Server that allows an unauthenticated attacker with network access to the LDAP port to cause a denial of service. The denial of service is triggered by a single message sent over a TCP connection, no bind or other authentication is required. The message triggers a segmentation fault that results in slapd crashing.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
